name: Krios, Etherym of Illusion
text: 2 level 4 Etherym monsters You can target 1 of your banished Etherym monsters, attach it to this card as Xyz material. You can detach 2 Xyz materials from this card; special summon 1 of your banished Sea Serpent monsters. (quick effect) You can banish 1 monster from your GY; banish this card until the next end phase. You can only use each effect of "Krios, Etherym of Illusion" once per turn.
